channel.description: Internet freedom, the web and Mozilla.

item.title: Borg Journalism (via Scripting News)
item.description: Dave reacted negatively to this article. I think it's the first of many more to come, wherein a non-blogging journalist writes about their coming-to-terms with the weblog world.Link
item.dc:creator: Dietrich Ayala
